00039 class NMFALSUpdate
00040 {
00041  public:
00042   // Empty constructor required for the UpdateRule template.
00043   NMFALSUpdate() { }

00045   template<typename MatType>
00046   void Initialize(const MatType& dataset, const size_t rank)
00047   {
00048       (void)dataset;
00049       (void)rank;

00051 
00064   template<typename MatType>
00065   inline static void WUpdate(const MatType& V,
00066                              arma::mat& W,
00067                              const arma::mat& H)
00068   {
00069     // The call to inv() sometimes fails; so we are using the psuedoinverse.
00070     // W = (inv(H * H.t()) * H * V.t()).t();
00071     W = V * H.t() * pinv(H * H.t());
00072 
00073     // Set all negative numbers to machine epsilon
00074     for (size_t i = 0; i < W.n_elem; i++)
00075     {
00076       if (W(i) < 0.0)
00077       {
00078         W(i) = 0.0;
00079       }
00080     }
00081   }
00082 
00095   template<typename MatType>
00096   inline static void HUpdate(const MatType& V,
00097                              const arma::mat& W,
00098                              arma::mat& H)
00099   {
00100     H = pinv(W.t() * W) * W.t() * V;
00101 
00102     // Set all negative numbers to 0.
00103     for (size_t i = 0; i < H.n_elem; i++)
00104     {
00105       if (H(i) < 0.0)
00106       {
00107         H(i) = 0.0;
00108       }
00109     }
00110   }
00111 };
